participant_1.name: Jasmine
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Jasmine loves the thrill of racing her motorbike and enjoys the excitement of life.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i've light skin with big brown eyes.

participant_2.name: Luke
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, Luke enjoys the simple pleasures of life, like music and spending time outdoors with his dogs.
participant_2.background: i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i've two dogs.
